dn11:9-66.1: Furthermore, a Realized One arises in the world …
dn11:9-66.2: That’s how a mendicant is accomplished in ethics. …
dn11:9-66.3: They enter and remain in the first absorption …
dn11:9-66.4: This is called the demonstration of instruction.
dn11:9-66.5: They enter and remain in the second absorption …
dn11:9-66.8: This too is called the demonstration of instruction.
dn11:9-66.9: They project and extend the mind toward knowledge and vision …
dn11:9-66.10: This too is called the demonstration of instruction.
dn11:9-66.11: They understand: ‘… there is nothing further for this place.’
dn11:9-66.12: This too is called the demonstration of instruction.
